item.description:
Here is a link to the restaurant's website...

http://www.tulipstoneham.com/index.asp

Hi all! I am back and off to a great start finding this gem of a Restaurant in the Redstone PlazaÂ  in Stoneham. It is a huge 82,000square foot Hibachi Lounge and Steak house with a full fledged Sushi bar as well. I just walked through and it looks awesome and the prices are pretty decent. They also have Hibachi style where the cook will make it in front of you. I think we should try the party room route though that way we can order what we want. I need a minimum of 20 people for the space so there would be no charge. I was thinking of doing this next Thursday. There is a ton of parking as well. I will call the manager as soon as I see people signing up...The location is at the Redstone Plaza in Stoneham.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back party room with Social Fun Group
item.name: Asian Hibachi cuisine in Stoneham Joint Meetup with Social Fun
